column4: I've installed xubuntu on my usb harddrive. I've also installed grub on it...But at boot time, grub is launched but it cannot run any OS (xubuntu,windows...) . In menu.lst Xubuntu boot on (hd1,0)...what i wrong ?
have you tried running grub interactively?
interactively....mmm..what do you mean ? ..I just try to modify boot command line, whithout success
mm ok, but I can do this here (=>xubuntu livecd)
with tab completion I see several command , but I don't see The good
thx for the help, I will say you all in 5 minutes, I come back
I do reboot X, I can't write anythin on terminal now..:-S
I send you PM with command line
i believe grub accepts extra arguments before booting your system. just add "3" (without the quotes). that should send you to a cli login. from there, do your thing
re, just to say you : all works fine, I'm on xubuntu harddrive system now, thanks for your help
glad to hear it, especially since i don't use ubuntu myself :)
or I think if you chroot on your installed system with your livecd, you can change pwd with command line passwd...
